fields.description: As one of the engineering week decisions, we will move the iOS-only {{Ti.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator}} core-component to an own module in 7.0.0 and deprecate the core-component to remove it from the core in 8.0.0.
fields.summary: iOS: Deprecate Ti.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator, move to own module "Ti.FeedbackGenerator"

comments.body: [~hknoechel] Any specific reason to create new module. Is it to minimise core size?
